```pddl
[
  '(:action knit_web ; knit a flat web
      :parameters (?p - agent ?web - object)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?web) (not (knit ?web)))
      :effect (and (knit ?web)))',
  
  '(:action knit ; Knit an item and update its status
      :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (not (knit ?item)))
      :effect (and (knit ?item)))',
  
  '(:action join ; Join elements and update their status
      :parameters (?p - agent ?item1 - object ?item2 - object)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item1) (inventory ?p ?item2) (not (joined ?item1 ?item2)))
      :effect (and (joined ?item1 ?item2)))',
  
  '(:action wrap ; Wrap the top of an item and update its state
      :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?material - material)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (joined ?item) (not (wrapped ?item)))
      :effect (and (wrapped ?item)))',
  
  '(:action sliplargerbeads ; Sew a web or larger item into a rectangular form
      :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object)
      :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (knit ?item) (not (sewn ?item)))
      :effect (and (sewn ?item)))'
]
```
